title: CFPB Proposes Ban on Class Action Waivers
text: CFPB Proposes Ban on Class Action Waivers more+ </iframe> ’s invitation to present the financial services industry’s position on the proposed rules. We have issued an E-alert on this important development which contains a link to the CFPB’s outline of its proposals.
